alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 27 at 10:59PM EST until December 28 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Florida, Coastal Nassau, Eastern Clay and Western Putnam Counties. In Georgia, Coastal Glynn and Coastal Camden Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Western Putnam
